name: Bingo Candy Fun Blast
description:
****** Free Jackpot Bingo Game! *****

****** Action-packed bingo fun ******

Rack up big wins of Las Vegas in this brand new and exciting bingo game!

Get ready for an amazing hands-on experience, bringing the excitement of Las Vegas to your iPhone, iPod touch and iPad by transforming your device into a feature-packed casino. This game brings the full bingo experience everywhere you go.

Enjoy the thrill of Bingo of varying levels of difficulty to challenge your skills. This game delivers the look and feel of some of the world’s finest casinos, featuring rich graphics that create a vibrant and true-to-life gaming experience.

With high quality graphics and themes, you'll have fun playing for hours on end.

Features:

* Huge Bonuses Daily
* Collect Hundreds of Coins
* Exciting animations and cool effects
* Unlock great new levels
* Simple interface

Experience Vegas in the palm of your hand!

Download FREE Today!
